mapper.update: update USR set ORG = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOC = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRDAT = #{strdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAINURL = #{mainurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRTUSR = #{crtusr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRTDAT = #{crtdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USEFLG = #{useflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFLOC = #{defloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNLOC = #{ownloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTNOTE = #{postnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CENTREID = #{centreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEAMID = #{teamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAT1 = #{dat1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DAT2 = #{dat2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFORG = #{deforg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDFLG = #{updflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, IMGGUID = #{imgguid,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KH = #{kh,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDDAT = #{upddat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IFMOREN = #{ifmoren,jdbcType=CHAR}, REFID = #{refid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MZ = #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BARCOD = #{barcod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISOL = #{isol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENROOM = #{openroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENTTIME = #{currenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VOICE = #{voice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDOC = #{isdoc,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGTYPE = #{regtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDICARECARD = #{medicarecard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNO = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SONNO = #{sonno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERGRAL = #{intergral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTRYTYP = #{countrytyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPX = #{groupx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOMEID = #{homeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYTEXT = #{sytext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIPFLG = #{vipflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRDPARTYID = #{thirdpartyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update USR set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR} and ORG ='CHIS'
mapper.select: select name from usr where org='CHIS' and name= #{0,jdbcType=CHAR}
select passwd from usr where org='CHIS' and guid= #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select passwd from usr where org='CHIS' and id= #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update usr set passwd=#{NewPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where org='CHIS' guid= #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}
update usr set passwd=#{NewPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where org='CHIS' and id= #{MOBILE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select case when (sysdate - currenttime) * 24 * 60 * 60 <1500000 then '1' else '2' end stat,isol,id from usr where GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR} and (sysdate - currenttime) * 24 * 60 * 60 <15000000
select IDCARD,NAME from usr where GUID=#{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}
